title: List of tallest buildings in Shanghai
summary: The city of Shanghai, China is one of the fastest-growing cities in the world in terms of skyscraper construction,[1] with the City of Shanghai reporting at the end of 2004 that there had been 6,704 buildings of 11 stories or more completed since 1990.[2] In 2011 there are over 20,000 buildings 11 stories or higher and  more than 1,000 buildings exceeding 30 stories in Shanghai.[3]  As of January 2019, there are 165 high-rise buildings either under construction, approved for construction, or proposed for construction, of which five are over 300 m (980 ft) high.[4]
